title: EGYPT'S SECRETS
text: We unlock Egypt's secret chambers to reveal centuries-old mysteries and magic.

title: APOCALYPSE: THE SECOND WORLD WAR
text: Apocalypse tells us about this huge conflict through the tragic destiny of those who went to war.

title: EGYPT'S SUN KING
text: A team of archaeologists discover the first new tomb to contain a body since the tomb of Tutankhamon.

title: FLOODED TOMBS OF THE NILE
text: Archaeologist's dive into a flooded pyramid near the Nile, to search for a king's burial that could reveal clues about the ancient kingdom of Kush.

title: UNFORGETTABLE HISTORY
text: he 1-hour weekly block highlights historical events that shaped the course of the world.

title: BACK TO THE TITANIC
text: Mission Titanic documents the first manned dives to Titanic in nearly 15 years.

title: PETRA SECRETS
text: In the heart of the Jordanian desert, the ancient city of Petra is full of mysteries.
